text: Rachel: Jake, you're always so cheerful!
speaker: Rachel

text: Mike: Yeah, but today he's extra cheerful because he just won the lottery!
speaker: Mike

text: Jake: Whoa whoa, slow down guys, I actually lost my ticket!
speaker: Jake

text: Mike: Don't worry Jake, I got your back. I'll help you find it!
speaker: Mike

text: Rachel: Yeah, but first let's grab a drink to celebrate Jake's misfortune!
speaker: Rachel

text: Jake: Thanks guys, you're the best!
speaker: Jake

text: Rachel: Now let's go find that ticket!
speaker: Rachel
